str2: A primary particle; properly, indicative of affirmation or concession; usually followed by a contrasted clause with de.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
